thread.title: Kal
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Kal

author: Kal
title: Kal
text: Good customer service. Good prices. Good collection. Good quality products. The website though can use some improvements. It is slow. I also would like to see old/discontinued products and parts on the website. Occasionally I need to order parts for an old kit that's still working. Finally, it would be great to have a matrix that shows the interchangeability of the different parts of the different kits/systems; tanks, atomizers, batteries, etc.
